title: Women's Gloves, 1800–20
medium:
Medium: kid leather
Technique: printed, scalloped
dimensions: H x W: 22.9 x 9.2 cm (9 x 3 5/8 in.) each
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Pair of women's wrist-length white kid gloves with the upper edge scalloped, pinked and pierced. Printed all over in black in a fine linear design of concentric ovals. On the back of each hand, a scene of a gentleman giving a gift to a lady seated under a tree. Around the wrist, a chain of lozenge shapes and floral forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Women's Gloves, 1800–20.
1800–20. Medium: kid leather
Technique: printed, scalloped. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1941-86-4-a,b.
